sourcesContent:
<template>
    <b-container fluid>
        <b-form>
            <b-row class="mt-2">
                <b-col sm="2" offset="2">
                    <b-input v-model="newModel" class="mb-2 mr-sm-2 mb-sm-0" placeholder="Enter new model"></b-input>
                </b-col>
                <b-col sm="5">
                    <b-form-textarea v-model="newProducer" placeholder="Enter new producer"></b-form-textarea>
                </b-col>
                <b-col sm="1">
                    <b-button variant="primary" size="lg" @click="addNew">Save</b-button>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>
        </b-form>
        
    </b-container>
    
</template>

<script>
    import { mapActions } from 'vuex';

    export default {
        name: "EditMessage",
        
        props: {
            user: {
                type: String,
                default: ''
            },
            message: {
                type: String,
                default: ''
            }
        },
        data() {
            return {
                newModel: '',
                newProducer: '',
                id:''
            }
        },
        mounted: function () {
            this.newModel = this.model;
            this.newProducer = this.producer;
        },
        methods: {
            ...mapActions(['new_message', 'change_message']),

            addNew: function() {
                const msg = JSON.stringify({model: this.newModel, producer: this.newProducer});

                if (!this.$route.params.id)
                    this.new_message(msg);
                else{
                    console.log(this.newModel);
                    this.change_message({id: this.$route.params.id, msg:msg});
                }
                this.newModel = '';
                this.newProducer = '';
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
